body:
GMSH provided libs such as Metis, Netgen, or now Eigen, Alglib, Voropp can also be replaced by external libs.
The dependencies to the external to GMSH libs were not clear.
Also, the CMake setting needs ENABLE_STUFF:BOOL=val not merely STUFF:BOOL=val.
Unluckily it seems impossible to compile GMSH with an external Metis.
I hope @sethrj could give advises.
title: gmsh: fix variant flags and dependencies
